column4: I have tryied  www.gnomefiles.org and http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=92672 Wwith no successful results.

I am looking for some assistance to find the gnome repository.  I just installed mythbuntu, it uses xfce as the desktop.  I want to install gnome but not all of the dependencies are available in the repository list.  What repository do I need to add to get all the depenedncies so that I can install gnome?  Can anone hlp m withthis? When I try to install gnome from the synaptic package manager, it informs me that I have missing

[22:40] <mildred> dependencies.  That leads me to believe that I could resolve this problem if I had the proper repositories configured.  I am looking for the repos but I cant find them. I have tryied  www.gnomefiles.org and http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=92672 Wwith no successful results.
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
